value: I hope Father is well...

Grado is a large country, but it is not
great in wealth. Earthquakes cause
trouble frequently as well...

I don't care for places that bustle
with people...

I'm not built to wield a sword, spear,
or axe—or even a bow. That is why
I pour my effort into studying magic.

Hhnngg! Ahh... General Duessel often
tells me to stand up straight, stretch
my back, and breathe deeply.

My name is Lyon. I was told to give
you this by $Nf.

Can I grow even more powerful still?
If so, I aim to, for father's sake—and
for the sake of Grado!

You would not retreat, so what
choice did I have!

I will not be ashamed, nor will I shout
in anger... I am the prince of Grado.

This is a strange feeling... What are
your expectations with regard to my
growth, $Nu?

I am Lyon of Grado. I am new to this
place, so I hope we can be friends.

My father is Vigarde, the emperor of
Grado. He is a great man who thinks
only of his people.$k$pI hear he is called the Silent Emperor
by some, and is not taken seriously...
But he is truly strong—unlike me.$k$pGrado has General Duessel too, so
our military is strong. That is why I
will support Grado with my studies.$k$pSpeaking of which, my father often
journeys beyond Grado in search of
those who might be of service.$k$pI'd like to introduce you to Father
if I get the chance. I think he would
appreciate meeting you!
